E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1989
Subject: Robin Ventura learns new position
Robin Ventura has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Rightfield.
I would rate his skills as "C" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1989
Subject: I will retire
Hey Boss,
I will hang up the cleats after this season.
It was a great time, but my family needs me now.

Regards,
Bill Madlock



Date: Wednesday, 4/2/1989
Subject: Dave Meier learns new position
Dave Meier has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Second Base.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Chris Hammond
Dear Sir,
Chris Hammond is doing pretty good at AA Havana Blast!
He has an ERA of 3.56, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Dear Sir,

He has an ERA of 1.95 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
